summary: The module implements a hierarchy of tokenizers for text‑to‑speech applications, providing base utilities for converting raw text into token identifiers and specialized tokenizers for characters and phonemes across several languages, as well as IPA handling and configurable probability settings.
business_intent: Facilitate multilingual speech synthesis pipelines by transforming input text into model‑ready token sequences, supporting language‑specific preprocessing and phoneme encoding for accurate TTS generation.
